summary: A comprehensive collection of Python example scripts that demonstrate how to use the CCXT library (both synchronous and asynchronous variants) to connect to cryptocurrency exchanges, retrieve market data (tickers, order books, OHLCV), manage accounts and orders (including margin, futures, options, and arbitrage), perform technical analysis, handle rate limits and proxies, and visualize results via ASCII charts or console tables.
business_intent: To serve as a practical learning and reference resource for developers building cryptocurrency trading bots, data aggregation pipelines, and analytical tools, showcasing bestâ€‘practice patterns for interacting with exchange APIs through CCXT.
